snippet.title: The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend is an upcoming puzzle adventure VR game that aims to tell the forgotten story of the legendary Cheng Shih, the most successful pirate in history. Use wit and strategy to navigate obstacles and unravel her fascinating story. Use an array of VR gameplay mechanics including exploration, throwing, climbing, rowing, fishing, and solving environmental puzzles. The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend is coming to Meta Quest 2 and Steam in Early 2024.

#Gaming #GameTrailers #VR
